H0.text: From which other card game is bridge derived . Poker

H1.text: From which other card game is bridge derived . Canasta

H2.text: From which other card game is bridge derived . Euchre

H3.text: From which other card game is bridge derived . WHIST

A4.text: As Whist is the simplest form of Triumph played with full 52-card pack and developed formal rules, it formed the basis of many subsequent trick-taking games.

A5.text: In the early 1890s, Whist was quickly replaced by the new game of Bridge in clubs.
